description: A narrow vertical column of basalt, balancing on its tip on Long Island, Digby Neck. Well groomed 2.5 km trail with a 235 step staircase that leads to the platform with the view of St. Mary's Bay and the Balancing Rock.
directions: Towards Digby Neck. Off Hwy 217, 4km from first ferry. Ferry cost is $5.50 for round trip (as of spring 2013). Drive into Tiverton and follow signage to the Balancing Rock. Open May 18 Oct-31
title: Balancing Rock
